text: Hirtella megacarpa is a species of plant in the family Chrysobalanaceae. It is endemic to Tanzania. ==References== * Lovett, J. & Clarke, G.P. 1998. Hirtella megacarpa. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. megacarpa Category:Endemic flora of Tanzania Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hirtella megacarpa
